FTL.text: Oxygen: Replenishes the ship's oxygen supply.
Doors: Allows for remote opening/closing of doors.
Doors: Allows for remote opening/closing of doors. On your ship, tap individual doors or drag over multiple to open or close them.
Shields: Sustains projectile-blocking shields. Manning increases shield recharge speed.
Piloting: Requires a crewmember to evade in combat or jump.
Engines: Charges the FTL drive and powers evasion. Manning increases dodge chance.
Sensors: Enables view of all rooms and info for enemy ships.
Medbay: Heals crewmembers inside the Medbay
Weapons: Click on a weapon to charge and fire. Manning reduces charge time.
Weapons: Tap on a weapon to charge and fire. Manning reduces charge time.
Drones: Power automated robots for attack and defense.
Teleporter: Send crewmembers in the teleporter room to board enemy ships.
Cloaking: Partially disappear into another dimension, providing +60 to dodge and temporarily stopping enemy weapon charging and aiming.
Artillery: Beam that automatically fires a 1 damage beam that pierces all shields.
Reactor: Unused reactor energy available to power your systems.
Battery: Activate to temporarily increase available reactor power.
Clone Bay: Automatically clones any dead crewmember.
Mind Control: Turn enemies into friendlies temporarily.
Hacking: Lockdown a system room while periodically disrupting the system and stunning crew.
Oxygen: Replenishes the enemy ship's oxygen supply.
Doors: Powers enemy blast doors, delaying boarder movement.
Shields: Powers the enemy's projectile blocking shields.
Piloting: If functional with a crew-member, the enemy can dodge your shots.
Engines: Charges the enemy FTL drive and powers evasion.
Sensors: No functionality for the enemy.
Medbay: Heals enemy crewmembers.
Weapons: Powers the enemy's weapons.
Weapons: Powers the enemy's weapons. Destroy it to stop them firing.
Drones: Powers the enemy's drones. Destroy it to shut them down.
Teleporter: The enemy uses this to teleport intruders onto your ship.
Cloaking: When in use, your weapons cannot charge and the enemy evasion is increased by 60.
Artillery: Powers a single powerful weapon.
Battery: Grants temporary power to the enemy.
Clone Bay: Will automatically clone any crew you kill, reviving them to fight again!
Mind Control: Can temporarily gain control of your crew. Destroy it to prevent this.
Hacking: Launches a hacking drone that can temporarily disable a system.

Oxygen: The average oxygen level in your ship. Most crew need oxygen to live. Your Oxygen System will replenish this if powered.
Zoltan Energy Shield: Will completely block incoming damage of any weapon type.
